Auto-Save Performance Demo

Performance Optimizations Applied:

  • ✅ Increased debounce interval from 1000ms to 2000ms
  • ✅ Content diffing to prevent redundant saves
  • ✅ Batch storage operations
  • ✅ Event deduplication with passive listeners
  • ✅ Memory optimization with cleanup
  • ✅ Smart caching in storage manager

Auto-Save Status

Name field:Saved
Email field:Saved
Message field:Saved
Overall status:All Changes Saved

Testing Instructions

  1. Type in any field - notice the 2-second delay before auto-save
  2. Type the same content again - no save will occur (content diffing)
  3. Open browser dev tools and check the console for auto-save logs
  4. Check localStorage for saved data
  5. Refresh the page to test recovery functionality
